statements: SELECT * FROM FoodDiaryEntries
SELECT food_name, calorie_count FROM FoodDiaryEntries WHERE calorie_count > 500
SELECT entry_id, food_name, entry_date FROM FoodDiaryEntries ORDER BY entry_date DESC
SELECT food_name, calorie_count FROM FoodDiaryEntries WHERE entry_date = '2022-04-25'
SELECT AVG(calorie_count) AS average_calories FROM FoodDiaryEntries
SELECT * FROM FoodDiaryEntries ORDER BY entry_date DESC, calorie_count ASC
SELECT food_name, calorie_count FROM FoodDiaryEntries WHERE calorie_count > 500 ORDER BY calorie_count DESC
SELECT MAX(calorie_count) AS max_calories, MIN(calorie_count) AS min_calories FROM FoodDiaryEntries
SELECT * FROM FoodDiaryEntries WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(calorie_count) AS avg_calories FROM FoodDiaryEntries
SELECT * FROM FoodDiaryEntry;
SELECT entry_id, food_name, calorie_count FROM FoodDiaryEntry WHERE calorie_count > 500;
SELECT entry_id, entry_date, food_name FROM FoodDiaryEntry ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM Recipe WHERE calorie_count < 500;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM Recipe ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoodDiaryEntry WHERE calorie_count > 500 ORDER BY entry_date DESC
SELECT food_name, calorie_count FROM FoodDiaryEntry WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY calorie_count ASC
SELECT entry_id, entry_date, food_name FROM FoodDiaryEntry WHERE food_name LIKE 'Chicken%' OR food_name LIKE 'Salad%'
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM Recipe WHERE calorie_count < 400 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Recipe WHERE instructions IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM food_diary ORDER BY date DESC, calorie_count ASC;
SELECT food_name, calorie_count FROM food_diary WHERE calorie_count > 500;
SELECT entry_id, date, food_name, calorie_count FROM food_diary WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe_suggestions WHERE dietary_preferences = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM calorie_intake ORDER BY intake_date DESC, calories_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_diary ORDER BY date DESC, calorie_count ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT food_name, calorie_count FROM food_diary WHERE calorie_count > 500 ORDER BY calorie_count DESC;
SELECT entry_id, date, food_name, calorie_count FROM food_diary WHERE calorie_count < 300 OR date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC, calorie_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM calorie_intake JOIN food_diary ON calorie_intake.entry_id = food_diary.entry_id WHERE calories_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY intake_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients, dietary_preferences FROM recipe_suggestions WHERE dietary_preferences = 'Vegetarian' ORDER BY recipe_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM food_entry;
SELECT food_name, calorie_amount FROM food_entry WHERE calorie_amount > 100;
SELECT entry_date, food_name FROM food_entry ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT entry_id, food_name FROM food_entry WHERE food_name LIKE 'Chicken%';
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM user_profile ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT food_name, calorie_amount FROM food_entry WHERE calorie_amount > 500 ORDER BY food_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM user_profile WHERE dietary_preference = 'Vegetarian' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT entry_date, intake_amount FROM food_entry JOIN calorie_intake ON food_entry.entry_id = calorie_intake.entry_id WHERE intake_time BETWEEN '12:00:00' AND '18:00:00' ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT suggested_recipe, suggested_time FROM recipe_suggestion JOIN user_profile ON recipe_suggestion.user_id = user_profile.user_id WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY suggested_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM User
SELECT username, email FROM User
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients, preparation_steps FROM Recipes
SELECT date, total_calories FROM CalorieIntake ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT food_name, calories FROM FoodDiaryEntries WHERE calories > 500 ORDER BY calories ASC
SELECT * FROM FoodDiaryEntries WHERE calories > 500 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT food_name, calories FROM FoodDiaryEntries WHERE meal_time = 'Dinner' ORDER BY calories ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id < 5 AND CHAR_LENGTH(ingredients) > 50;
SELECT * FROM CalorieIntake WHERE total_calories BETWEEN 1500 AND 2000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT username, age FROM User WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY username;
